Class Tablero

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.uc3m.gade4all.game.Tablero

  • public class Tablero
extends Object
    Class that represents the scenario of the game (board).
    Author:
    Sandra Garcia Rodriguez

        width - Map width
        height - Map heigh
        specialC - List of the special cells
        enemigos - List of the special enemies
        juagadores - List of the special players

        Parameters:
        x - Coordinate X.
        y - Coordinate Y.
        ataque - Attack radius
        Returns:
        number-of-players Number of players that are reached

      • numAtacantes

        public int numAtacantes(int enX,

        Calculate the number of players that attack to the element at position (enX,enY).
        Parameters:
        enX - Coordinate X.
        enY - Coordinate Y.
        Returns:
        sum-of-attack The sum of all the attack powers
